turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to make a coffee order for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti triple espresso with five sugars and a drizzle of honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say 5 sugars?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me repeat your order to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: venti triple espresso with 5 sugars and a drizzle of honey, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti triple espresso with 5 sugars and a drizzle of honey, to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Taylor, Michigan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me find the closest starbucks to you, one moment please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is the starbucks in southland center close to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me transfer your order to that store, one moment please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have transferred your order to the starbucks in southland center, it will be ready for pickup in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.
